definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to draw water/(fig.) to promote sb to a more senior position

sentences.english: Qianyan Temple is really a treasure place with the talent of the mountains and water.
sentences.chinese: 嵌巖寺，不愧是一處汲天地之靈氣的風水寶地。

sentences.english: One day, Ji'An said to the emperor with unbearableness felling.
sentences.chinese: 一天，汲黯忍不住對皇帝說。

sentences.english: Ground water is usually removed by man through wells.
sentences.chinese: 地上水一般是由人們從井裏汲上來。

sentences.english: In Han Dynasty, there was a person who named Ji'An.
sentences.chinese: 漢朝時，有一個叫汲黯的人。

sentences.english: But he is still a coutling in the imperial court.
sentences.chinese: 汲黯還是在朝廷裏當個小官。

sentences.english: The swabbing rope is to be marked.
Chlorine dioxide produced by electrolysis is pumped by a water-jet machine.
sentences.chinese: 電解產生的二氧化氯由水射器抽汲出去。

sentences.english: We must bail water out quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須趕快將水汲出去。

definition: to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
